text: Road to Life () is a 1931 Soviet drama movie directed by Nikolai Ekk.Путевка в жизньОбычно в начале сентября в Канне бывает тихо It stars Nikolai Batalov, Yvan Kyrlya, and Mikhail Dzhagofarov. == Actors == * Nikolai Batalov - Nikolai Sergeiev * Yvan Kyrlya - Dandy Mustapha * Mikhail Dzhagofarov - Nikolai 'Kolka' Rebrov * Aleksandr Novikov – Vaska Busa * Mikhail Zharov – Fomka Zhigan == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1931 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Road to Life (1931 movie)
